LOL """"communist liberal agenda."""" And you think OTHER people overuse buzzwords? Sure... And this isn't about girls using the boy's bathroom, or boys using the girl's bathroom. It's about criminalizing trans people for using the correct bathroom (i.e. trans women in the ladies' room, and trans men in the men's room.) It's not a matter of """"political correctness,"""" it's a matter of safety, respect, equality, and fairness in bathroom placement. And the horrid individual who wrote this bill did so with the sole purpose of denying all of those to transsexual people. Why would you support somebody like that?
